body:
Features and Enhancements

Cost Analysis
  • Now, users can export reports for all the categories (also referred to as buckets) of cost impact analysis results, including Non-Participating Repriced (NPAR) and Unexpected Pass Through (UPT).
  • Provider Allocation Details report name will appear as “Cost Impact Provider Allocation Details.” Also, the Expected Passthrough (EPT) report name will appear as “Cost Impact Expected Passthrough.”
  • Implemented more consistent style for displaying values within various exports. Now the Participating (PAR), Non-Participating (NPAR), Non-Contracted Reprice (NCR), Out of Network (OON), Expected Passthrough (EPT), and Unexpected Passthrough (UPT) reports are rounded to the second decimal place. With these updates, the detailed information better matches the summaries in the UI. Cost Impact Provider Allocation Details and Provider Details reports continue to be rounded to the nearest dollar amount and match the UI.
  • These bucket reports are sorted by the original provider and then by the claim number when this information is available.
Tech Update
Icons throughout Network360
  • Icons throughout Network360 have been upgraded. There are some minor differences in a few icons, e.g. the Competitive Analysis icon in the side bar navigation analysis has more shading.

Fixed Issues

Insights
  • A client’s users see only the Insights reports associated with the client.
Cost Analysis
  • Now when viewing the results on the provider summary tab, sorting by location correctly considers the second address line information.
